heading: How popular is the radio regarding news access across all EU countries?
subheading: Overall 37% of the respondents acroll all EU countries have used the radio the most to access news.
textNote: Flash Eurobarometer FL012EP – Media & News Survey 2023 / Fieldwork: 18/10 – 24/10/2023 (%) Base: n=25 956– All respondents (EU27)
